Name: Alley Twitch Bot
About the game: Alley Twitch Bot is a convenient stream bot for streamers. It's a twitch chat bot that helps you get more effective interaction with audiences. Alley twitch bot will always focus on improving streaming experience. advantages ● Easy to start you a twitch account for bot name and your main twitch account for the bot to work or you can use your own twitch account to post as the bot. ● Simply to use, no complex setting, clean and fast ● Free to get all features features ● User Chat Points? ● We have added a points system where viewers can earn point just by watching a streamer. ● Tired Of Answering Repetitive Questions? ● Viewers can type in command to be able to find a simple answer to there questions. Games? ●We have added couple of games to our bot so viewers can earn points We have Coin Flip - Simple Gamble Game and !gamble game there game can help viewers earn more points for the channel to play our games on our bot . ● Want to quickly promote your social account and get more attention? ●You can use timer to periodically push links, announcements, activities, etc. Custom Categories? ● We have created a system which others don't have (Get Our Alley Twitch Bot to see this). Our Plans ● Chat Dashboard (Be able to see chat in side bot and be able to comment via chat). ● Blacklisted words (Block words that user does not want in chat). ● Cool down timer ( So commands can not be spammed). ● Quit Settings. ● Change stream information. update Plans We plan on doing updates to Alley Twitch Bot every month unless we find any bugs then we will publish a update so our users can get a better experience with a bot that is there for them as a stream and not have any problems
